summary: A critically acclaimed book vanished. Its author forgotten. One reader determined to find out why.
cast: Carl Brandt|Frank Conroy|Bruce Dobler|Robert C.S. Downs|Robert Ellis|Leslie Fiedler|Ed Gorman|Robert Gottlieb|John Kashiwabara|Norman Mailer|Mark Moskowitz|Dow Mossman|William Cotter Murray|Mario Puzo|John Seelye
title: Stone Reader
